<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Check to see if the loop has a canonical induction variable: an integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// recurrence that starts at 0 and increments by one each time through the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// variable.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;getCanonicalInductionVariable() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Obtain the unique incoming and back edge. Return false if they are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// non-unique or the loop is dead; otherwise, return true.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Below are some utilities to get the loop guard, loop bounds and induction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// variable, and to check if a given phinode is an auxiliary induction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// variable, if the loop is guarded, and if the loop is canonical.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Here is an example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for (int i = lb; i &lt; ub; i+=step)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &lt;loop body&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// --- pseudo LLVMIR ---</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// beforeloop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   guardcmp = (lb &lt; ub)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   if (guardcmp) goto preheader; else goto afterloop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// preheader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   i&#95;1 = phi&#91;&#123;lb, preheader&#125;, &#123;i&#95;2, latch&#125;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   &lt;loop body&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   i&#95;2 = i&#95;1 + step</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// latch:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   cmp = (i&#95;2 &lt; ub)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   if (cmp) goto loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// exit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// afterloop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - getBounds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - getInitialIVValue      --&gt; lb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - getStepInst            --&gt; i&#95;2 = i&#95;1 + step</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - getStepValue           --&gt; step</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - getFinalIVValue        --&gt; ub</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - getCanonicalPredicate  --&gt; &#39;&lt;&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - getDirection           --&gt; Increasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - getInductionVariable            --&gt; i&#95;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - isAuxiliaryInductionVariable(x) --&gt; true if x == i&#95;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - getLoopGuardBranch()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 --&gt; &#96;if (guardcmp) goto preheader; else goto afterloop&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - isGuarded()                     --&gt; true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - isCanonical                     --&gt; false</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">LoopBounds &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return the LoopBounds object if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - the given \\p IndVar is an induction variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - the initial value of the induction variable can be found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - the step instruction of the induction variable can be found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - the final value of the induction variable can be found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Else std::nullopt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;Loop::LoopBounds&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a075be8282fe6debdda46c86d24a07684">getBounds</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Loop &amp;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;IndVar, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Get the initial value of the loop induction variable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#aef50b00cc2255dbd10973bfc3037ed6d"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#aef50b00cc2255dbd10973bfc3037ed6d">getInitialIVValue</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InitialIVValue; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Get the instruction that updates the loop induction variable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#aa9f6ce7426d11ba1d161c9ab70c165eb"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#aa9f6ce7426d11ba1d161c9ab70c165eb">getStepInst</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StepInst; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Get the step that the loop induction variable gets updated by in each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// loop iteration. Return nullptr if not found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a8c3f3e19245c65fd42f3dd807a9f58a9"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a8c3f3e19245c65fd42f3dd807a9f58a9">getStepValue</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StepValue; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Get the final value of the loop induction variable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1d893e58d8dc7d1b3453ad94392761f7"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1d893e58d8dc7d1b3453ad94392761f7">getFinalIVValue</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FinalIVValue; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return the canonical predicate for the latch compare instruction, if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// able to be calcuated. Else BAD&#95;ICMP&#95;PREDICATE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// A predicate is considered as canonical if requirements below are all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// satisfied:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// 1 The first successor of the latch branch is the loop header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///    If not, inverse the predicate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// 2 One of the operands of the latch comparison is StepInst</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///    If not, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///    - if the current calcuated predicate is not ne or eq, flip the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///      predicate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///    - else if the loop is increasing, return slt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///      (notice that it is safe to change from ne or eq to sign compare)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///    - else if the loop is decreasing, return sgt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///      (notice that it is safe to change from ne or eq to sign compare)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Here is an example when both (1) and (2) are not satisfied:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// loop.header:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  %iv = phi &#91;%initialiv, %loop.preheader&#93;, &#91;%inc, %loop.header&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  %inc = add %iv, %step</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  %cmp = slt %iv, %finaliv</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  br %cmp, %loop.exit, %loop.header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// loop.exit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - The second successor of the latch branch is the loop header instead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///   of the first successor (slt -&gt; sge)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - The first operand of the latch comparison (%cmp) is the IndVar (%iv)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///   instead of the StepInst (%inc) (sge -&gt; sgt)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The predicate would be sgt if both (1) and (2) are satisfied.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// getCanonicalPredicate() returns sgt for this example.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Note: The IR is not changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">ICmpInst::Predicate</a> getCanonicalPredicate() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// An enum for the direction of the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - for (int i = 0; i &lt; ub; ++i)  --&gt; Increasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - for (int i = ub; i &gt; 0; --i)  --&gt; Descresing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// - for (int i = x; i != y; i+=z) --&gt; Unknown</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703fa2e6a9b0375c021e8f650a5eb22012b5b"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703f">Direction</a> &#123; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703faf3ff61f20d0c8eedfa348b0298df5edd">Increasing</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703fa2e6a9b0375c021e8f650a5eb22012b5b">Decreasing</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703fa88183b946cc5f0e8c96b2e66e1c74a7e">Unknown</a> &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Get the direction of the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#ab4c7e3039b29b12e4dc97bcae93d79c3">Direction</a> getDirection() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the struct LoopBounds collected if all struct members are found,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// else std::nullopt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;LoopBounds&gt; getBounds(ScalarEvolution &amp;SE) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the loop induction variable if found, else return nullptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// An instruction is considered as the loop induction variable if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - it is an induction variable of the loop; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - it is used to determine the condition of the branch in the loop latch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: the induction variable doesn&#39;t need to be canonical, i.e. starts at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// zero and increments by one each time through the loop (but it can be).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PHINode &#42;getInductionVariable(ScalarEvolution &amp;SE) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if the given PHINode \\p AuxIndVar is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - in the loop header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - not used outside of the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - incremented by a loop invariant step for each loop iteration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - step instruction opcode should be add or sub</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the loop guard branch, if it exists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This currently only works on simplified loop, as it requires a preheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and a latch to identify the guard. It will work on loops of the form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// GuardBB:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   br cond1, Preheader, ExitSucc &lt;== GuardBranch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Preheader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   br Header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Header:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   br Latch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Latch:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   br cond2, Header, ExitBlock</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ExitBlock:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   br ExitSucc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ExitSucc:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BranchInst &#42;getLoopGuardBranch() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if the loop is annotated parallel.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A parallel loop can be assumed to not contain any dependencies between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// iterations by the compiler. That is, any loop-carried dependency checking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// can be skipped completely when parallelizing the loop on the target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// machine. Thus, if the parallel loop information originates from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// programmer, e.g. via the OpenMP parallel for pragma, it is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// programmer&#39;s responsibility to ensure there are no loop-carried</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dependencies. The final execution order of the instructions across</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// iterations is not guaranteed, thus, the end result might or might not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// implement actual concurrent execution of instructions across multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isAnnotatedParallel() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Update LoopInfo after removing the last backedge from a loop. This updates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the loop forest and parent loops for each block so that \\c L is no longer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// referenced, but does not actually delete \\c L immediately. The pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will remain valid until this LoopInfo&#39;s memory is released.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60a348350395aef11d68f58111bcf499">erase</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if replacing From with To everywhere is guaranteed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// preserve LCSSA form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo/#ab12b535502b86394c84bfd24d58e4657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo/#ab12b535502b86394c84bfd24d58e4657">replacementPreservesLCSSAForm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;To) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Preserving LCSSA form is only problematic if the replacing value is an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(To);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If both instructions are defined in the same basic block then replacement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cannot break LCSSA form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() == From-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the instruction is not defined in a loop then it can safely replace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anything.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;ToLoop = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ToLoop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the replacing instruction is defined in the same loop as the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, or in a loop that contains it as an inner loop, then using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it as a replacement will not break LCSSA form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ToLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a04337b572d34ea413c35dbac5d75530b">contains</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(From-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Checks if moving a specific instruction can break LCSSA in any loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if moving \\p Inst to before \\p NewLoc will break LCSSA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// assuming that the function containing \\p Inst and \\p NewLoc is currently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in LCSSA form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo/#aee580d948709366b6a676f8b48460137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo/#aee580d948709366b6a676f8b48460137">movementPreservesLCSSAForm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;NewLoc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a6a66ebb3aa12757479a3c88de77d78f8">getFunction</a>() == NewLoc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a6a66ebb3aa12757479a3c88de77d78f8">getFunction</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can&#39;t reason about IPO!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;OldBB = Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewBB = NewLoc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Movement within the same loop does not break LCSSA (the equality check is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to avoid doing a hashtable lookup in case of intra-block movement).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OldBB == NewBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;OldLoop = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(OldBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewLoop = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(NewBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OldLoop == NewLoop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if Outer contains Inner; with the null loop counting as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;outermost&quot; loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Contains = &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;Outer, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;Inner) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !Outer || Outer-&gt;contains(Inner);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To check that the movement of Inst to before NewLoc does not break LCSSA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need to check two sets of uses for possible LCSSA violations at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewLoc: the users of NewInst, and the operands of NewInst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we know we&#39;re hoisting Inst out of an inner loop to an outer loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the uses &#42;of&#42; Inst don&#39;t need to be checked.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Contains(NewLoop, OldLoop)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &amp;U : Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#abf855b7cd63a0cd7f73759e396f280c9">uses</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;UI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(U.getUser());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;UBB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(UI) ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(UI)-&gt;getIncomingBlock(U)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     : UI-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UBB != NewBB &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(UBB) != NewLoop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we know we&#39;re sinking Inst from an outer loop into an inner loop, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the &#42;operands&#42; of Inst don&#39;t need to be checked.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Contains(OldLoop, NewLoop)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See below on why we can&#39;t handle phi nodes here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(Inst))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &amp;U : Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#a0b931781aa589c6ebe64a76c1447e5b2">operands</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DefI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(U.get());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DefI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This would need adjustment if we allow Inst to be a phi node -- the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new use block won&#39;t simply be NewBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DefBlock = DefI-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DefBlock != NewBB &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(DefBlock) != NewLoop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if a new use of V added in ExitBB would require an LCSSA PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be inserted at the begining of the block.  Note that V is assumed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dominate ExitBB, and ExitBB must be the exit block of some loop.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IR is assumed to be in LCSSA form before the planned insertion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> wouldBeOutOfLoopUseRequiringLCSSA(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBB) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
